About Me

I'm a mechanical engineer by training, a software engineer by self-training, and a generalist by nature.

My professional experience is in the areas of:

  • small (2-5 person) team management.
  • full-system motorcycle testing and development.
  • surgical instrument design and testing.
  • surgical instrument test protocol development.
  • single-pitch rock climbing instruction.

I am currently seeking contract work on small teams (2-15 person). I am excited about work where I can apply both software and mechanical engineering skills or interact with users and customers. I am based in Redwood City, CA and Madison, WI.

Fixed Gear Bicycle

When I couldn't find the bike I wanted, I decided I'd build one myself. I designed and welded this steel frame and outfitted it with components.

Sprinter Camper Van

I lived in this van for 6 months while traveling the American West. The van featured solar power, stove, sink, bed, and custom "cabinetry".
